1164210.name: RPG Maker MV - FSM: Castle and Town
1164210.description:
For many anticipated RPG Maker users it's finally here!

Following the smash hit tileset packs from First Seed Material series (FSM: Town of Beginnings Tiles and FSM: Woods and Cave Tiles,) this third pack includes a selection of both inside and outside castle and town tilesets with versatile and useful materials perfect for creating castles, towns and fields around them. Additional sample game, manual and guide are included, complete with mapping tips and tricks!

This large and versatile set will allow you to create new areas with ease, while providing you with the tools to customize and improve your maps. Whether you're a beginner or seasoned veteran, FSM: Castle and Town Tiles is a must-have in your RPG Maker resource library!

FEATURES:

* Tilesets discribed below include: TileA1 / A2 / A4 / A5 / TileB / TileC / TileD / TileE, and half of the sheets are night version tiles.
* Interior Tileset for Castle: 26 sheets
* Exterior Tileset for Castle: 16 sheets
* Interior Tileset for Castle Town: 16 sheets
* Exterior Tileset for Castle Town: 26 sheets
* Map helper (character sets of objects such as fountain, water objects, various flame / light features, various doors / gates, chests and much more!) total of 102 sheets!
* Special extra tilesets: 16 sheets (*These tiles have to be edited with graphic editing software)
* Editable sample game, including completed maps that can be easily imported and used in other projects as well as history and inspiration for each area.
* Manual and guide with tips and tricks for using the material and for mapping.
* For use in RPG Makers, Visual Novel Maker or the engine of your choice!
1164210.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
